description: Lists the library items for Amazon Q Apps that are published and available for users in your Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

nested_items.name: libraryItems
nested_items.description: The list of library items meeting the request criteria.

nested_items.name: libraryItemId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the library item.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Q App associated with the library item.

nested_items.name: appVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the Q App associated with the library item.

nested_items.name: categories
nested_items.description: The categories associated with the library item.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the category.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title or name of the category.

nested_items.name: appCount
nested_items.description: The number of published Amazon Q Apps associated with a category.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the library item.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the library item was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the library item.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the library item was last updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last updated the library item.

nested_items.name: ratingCount
nested_items.description: The number of ratings the library item has received.

nested_items.name: isRatedByUser
nested_items.description: Whether the current user has rated the library item.

nested_items.name: userCount
nested_items.description: The number of users who have the associated Q App.

nested_items.name: isVerified
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the library item has been verified.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to request the next page of results.
